citations.narrative:
The registrant did not report new sites conducting research on regulated species within 10 days of making such a change.
Research was being conducted at locations including in Texas. Failure to provide notification of new sites could interfere
with APHIS official’s ability to inspect all animals that are impacted by regulated activity.
A research facility shall notify the Deputy Administrator in writing of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or
other change in operations affecting its status as a research facility, within 10 days after making such change. Correct by
taking actions which may include sending official notification to register the new sites. Correct by 1-JULY-2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives.
n

narrative:
2.30(c) 
   
Registration. 
The registrant did not report new sites conducting research on regulated species within 10 days of making such a change. 
Research was being conducted at locations including in Texas. Failure to provide notification of new sites could interfere 
with APHIS official’s ability to inspect all animals that are impacted by regulated activity. 
 
A research facility shall notify the Deputy Administrator in writing of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or 
other change in operations affecting its status as a research facility, within 10 days after making such change. Correct by 
taking actions which may include sending official notification to register the new sites. Correct by 1-JULY-2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives. 
 
 n
